mapper.insert: insert into vehiclefault (maintenanceType, taskClassification, paymentMethod, vin, createTime, updateTime) values (#{maintenanceType}, #{taskClassification},#{paymentMethod},#{vin},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update vehiclefault
maintenanceType = #{maintenanceType},
taskClassification = #{taskClassification},
paymentMethod = #{paymentMethod},
vin = #{vin},
createTime = #{createTime},
updateTime = #{updateTime}
where vehiclefault.vfi = #{vfi}
